Author: jeuoen
Text: Keto helps me lose hella weight and also makes my asthma go away ! I restrict carbs and fast all the time and lie and say it’s just for my lungs

Author: carlacoutoure
Text: I notice that whenever I eat anything, literally it could be an English muffin, and I feel like shit. Idk if it’s the 10+ years of binging and purging but my stomach and intensities are so wrecked by acid reflux it’s just hard to keep anything down.  This has just been a recent occurrence, so I’m hoping if I restrict enough I can drop 20lbs by the time autumn rolls around.
